attributes.action: Act to cease the glitzy, inaccurate, showbiz weather forecasts delivered by overpaid presenters, and replace with short weather reports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite satellite technology, despite the most powerful computers in the world, despite massive government spend, - the irritating weather "forecasters" continue to get it wrong by a league! Facile and silly presentations insult the intelligence of the viewer. They have become part of the television overpaid showtime culture. Please save us from all these "actor/presenters", - cut the glitzy presentations and go back to old fashioned weather reporting/forecasting in the style of the shipping forecast. 
Looking out of the window each day provides a more accurate idea than what this lot give.  Barbecue year indeed!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
